    • Constructor Detail

      • TicTacToe

        TicTacToe()

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • getArea

        private static void getArea()
        Get the size of the game board from user. Takes integer from user input and checks the value for positive numbers.

      • getPlayers

        private static void getPlayers()
        Get the number of players. Method for deciding whether user plays against CPU, other human or lets CPU play against itself. ONly allows integers from range 0-2.

      • setBoardSize

        private static void setBoardSize()
        Sets the size of the board. Initializes new String array with the size of playArea * playArea.

      • initializeBoard

        private static void initializeBoard()
        Fills out the board. Inserts empty brackets into each element of the gameBoard array.

      • printBoard

        private static void printBoard()
        Prints out the board. Iterates of the gameBoard array printing out every element.

      • placeMarker

        private static void placeMarker()
        Places X and O on the board and updates the board. Takes in turn information and asks user input for placement of the marker. Uses isMoveLegal for validating the user input and then updates the gameBoard array accordingly.

      • getCpuMove

        private static java.lang.String getCpuMove()
        Randomizes CPU move Builds a string containing the CPU move using Math.random for x and y coordinates. Checks move validity using isMoveLegal method until valid move is built. Returns combined moved as a string.
        Returns:
        String containing CPU move "x,y"

      • isMoveLegal

        private static boolean isMoveLegal(java.lang.String a)
        Checks validity of a player move Checks user input for correct length and that the selected location in the array is empty. Returns true when move is valid
        Parameters:
        a - user input String
        Returns:
        true when move is legal, false otherwise

      • changeTurn

        private static void changeTurn()
        Updates player turn.

      • setWinCondition

        private static void setWinCondition()
        Defines how many in a row is required for game to end. For a 3x3 or 4x4 board winCondition is set to 3, so in 3 in a row ends the game. For boards equal or larger than 5x5 condition is set to 5.

      • checkHorizontalIsOver

        private static void checkHorizontalIsOver()
        Checks if winCondition is met horizontally. Iterates over the gameBoard array starting from the recent player move location, incrementing a buffer for each matching symbol in adjacent cells. Checks if buffer count matches win condition and sets the isOver variable to true if buffer reaches the winCondition.

      • checkVerticalIsOver

        private static void checkVerticalIsOver()
        Checks if winCondition is met vertically. Iterates over the gameBoard array starting from the recent player move location, incrementing a buffer for each matching symbol in adjacent cells. Checks if buffer count matches win condition and sets the isOver variable to true if buffer reaches the winCondition.

      • checkDiagonalIsOver

        private static void checkDiagonalIsOver()
        Checks if winCondition is met diagonally. Iterates over the gameBoard array starting from the recent player move location, incrementing a buffer for each matching symbol in adjacent cells. Checks if buffer count matches win condition and sets the isOver variable to true if buffer reaches the winCondition.

      • checkWin

        private static void checkWin()
        Checks which player won if game is over. Checks isOver variable and if it's true and then checks current turn. Prints out the winner based on turn.

      • checkFull

        private static void checkFull()
        Checks board for a situation with no winner and no more empty cells Iterates over the gameBoard array checking for empty cells. Buffer is incremented for each empty cell. If buffer is 0 isOver is set to true and boardFull is set to true.
